ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:0.5_0: The training rule on covering with clothes
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.2_0: he allowed the itch-covering cloth for the monks.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.3_0: The monks from the group of six thought,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.4_0: Knowing this, the monks from the group of six wore itch covers that were inappropriate in size.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.5_0: As they were walking about, they were dragging them along, both in front and behind.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.6_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Udāyī,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.7_0: “How can the monks from the group of six wear such itch covers?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.11_0: “... Foolish men, how can you do this?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.13_0: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.14.1_0: ‘If a monk covers the robes with cloth for the right size, he should be made the right size.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.15_0: This is the right size: four standard handspans long and two wide.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:1.16_0: If one uses them beyond that, one commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.2_0: it is for the purpose of covering an itch or a boil or a running sore or a carbuncle, below the navel and above the knees.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.4_0: making it himself or having someone else make it, it should be made to the right size.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.5_0: This is the right size: four standard handspans long and two wide.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.6_0: If she makes one or has one made that exceeds that, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.7_0: When he obtains it, it is to be cut down, and he is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.8.1_0: If he finishes what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.9_0: If he has others finish what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.10_0: If she finishes herself what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.11_0: If he has others finish what was begun by others, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.12_0: If he makes one, or has one made, for someone else, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.13_0: If she obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.14.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.15_0: if he makes it the right size;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.16_0: if he makes it less than the right size;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.17_0: if he obtains one made by another that exceeds the right size and then cuts the legs down before using it;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.18_0: if she makes a canopy, a floor cover, a cloth screen, a mattress, or a pillow;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.20_0: if he is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc90:2.21_0: The eighth rule, the training rule on itch covers, is finished.
